Riddle School 3 – Escape Riddle High School

Riddle School 3 is a graphic point-and-click adventure game where players guide Phil Eggtree through Riddle High School, combining objects and solving puzzles to escape.

What is Riddle School 3?

Riddle School 3 continues the adventures of Phil Eggtree in a high school setting. Players explore classrooms, the library, and other areas, gathering items and clues to overcome obstacles and escape without getting caught.

How to Play Riddle School 3?

  • Point-and-Click: Click on objects and characters to interact and examine your environment.
  • Collect and Combine Items: Use items together to solve puzzles and advance through rooms.
  • Solve Puzzles: Apply logic and creativity to navigate the school and escape obstacles.
  • Explore Areas: Move through classrooms, hallways, the library, and hidden rooms to find essential items.
  • Avoid Teachers: Plan your actions carefully to prevent being caught while completing tasks.
